document.full_text: terrence malick won the palme d'or in cannes for "the tree of life," but the 2011 film festival will be remembered above all for the shock expulsion of danish director lars von trier for his hitler jokes.
document.title: malick win, von trier ban share cannes limelight
lines_and_colors: terrence malick won the palme d'or in cannes for "the tree of life," but the 2011 film festival will be remembered above all for the shock expulsion of danish director lars von trier for his hitler jokes.
